name: 陳盈竹
objective:
課程內容包括擴散原理、兩相之間的質傳理論，亂流的質量傳遞，涉及化學反應的質傳，同時發生質量與熱量的傳遞，以及多成分的擴散現象。
Topics covered include theory of diffusion, interphase mass transfer theory, mass transfer in turbulent flow, mass transfer with chemical reaction, simultaneous mass and heat transfer, multicomponent diffusion.
schedule:
Week#1: Course overview
Week#2: Introduction to Mass Transfer
Week#3: Molecular Diffusion & Fick's Law of Diffusion
Week#4: Steady state molecular diffusion in fluids
Week#5: Diffusion coefficient: Measurement and Prediction
Week#6: Multicomponent Diffusion and Diffusivity in Solids
Week#7: Dimensionless Groups and Co-relations for Convective
Week#8: Mass Transfer co-efficient in Laminar Flow Condition
Week#9: Mid-term exam
Week#10: Mass Transfer Coefficients in Terbulant Flow
Week#11: Interphase Mass Transfer and Mass Transfer Theoriess
Week#12: Agitated and Sparged Vassels
Week#13: Tray Column
Week#14: Packed Tower
Week#15: Distillation and Phase diagrams
Week#16: Fractional Distillation
Week#17: Oral presentation
Week#18: Oral presentation
materials: 1.	Mass-Transfer Operations by R.E. Treybal, 3rd Ed., McGraw-Hill, New York, 1981.
